data: `minecraft:boostable` defines the conditions and behavior of a rideable entity's boost.

data.Name: boost_items
data.Description: List of items that can be used to boost while riding this entity.

data.Name: duration
data.Description: Time in seconds for the boost.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Factor by which the entity's normal speed increases. E.g. 2.0 means go twice as fast.

data: `boost_items` is a list defined by two parameters. Each item has the following properties:

data.Name: damage
data.Description: This is the damage that the item will take each time it is used.

data.Name: item
data.Description: Name of the item that can be used to boost.

data.Name: replace_item
data.Description: The item used to boost will become this item once it is used up.
